Set apart from their prior WWF-licensed ring-based titles, it envisioned eight original brawlers fighting across dynamic urban backdrops—streets, parks, fairgrounds—rather than confined arenas . Gameplay would have featured grapples, dropkicks, pins, and environmental attacks, such as bouncing opponents off street scenery or even drowning them in a pool level that utilized SNES transparency tech.

name: Wretch: Divine Ascent
summary: A dark fantasy 1v1 auto battler game with 3D action elements inspired by Backpack Battle You have a complete backpack that allows you to purchase various items (equipment, accessories, skills, etc.), creating a powerful build unique to you.

name: Wret
summary:
Five Days of Dread
A tightly paced horror experience that escalates each day.

No Dialogue. No Escape.
The story unfolds purely through visuals, sound, and space — no text, no voice, no guidance.

PSX-Inspired Visuals
Low-resolution textures and unsettling retro environments amplify the unease.

Atmospheric Psychological Horror
No chases. No combat. Just presence, tension, and the terror of being watched.

name: Wrecked
summary: See how long you can survive on an island full of wildlife - and even wilder people! Compete for resouces with a new 2-handed control system that doubles the ways you can interact with the world around you - putting the power to create or destroy in your own hands. Explore the island's 10 unique locations long enough to solve the mystery of why you're there - and what lies on the other side of the ocean...

name: Wrench Towers
summary: Wrench Towers is a tower defense game inspired by the golden age of Flash games, with a modern take on gameplay and pixel art.

name: Wrangle Ranch
summary: Wrangle animals, grow your herd, and discover game breaking combos in this farm-to-desktop, roguelike barnbuilder.

name: Wretch
summary: Find the violent stalker hiding inside an abandoned school. Piece together broken lore and solve a long lost mystery. What happened here and who's to blame??

name: Wrath of Athena
summary: Wrath of Athena is set in ancient Greece, where heroes of mythology and mankind coexist. When the forces of Hades rise and bring terror to Athens, only you can stand against them. Begin your journey from Athens to the Underworld, exploring iconic landmarks like Mount Olympus and the River Styx. Face endless dungeons filled with monsters and treasures, uncover powerful weapons and artifacts, and recruit followers to aid you in battle.

name: Wreckin' Raccoon
summary:
Wreckin' Raccoon is a game about being a raccoon in a chef's kitchen. The objective is to get food from the kitchen safely back to your hideout without getting caught. However, the chef will try to stop you!

Players are invited to cause chaos in the kitchen as they hunt for items: create odd foods, misplace items, break things, climb all over objects in the kitchen, zipline to the roof, and even poo in chef's toilet.

The game will have regular updates on a weekly and monthly basis that will expand players' options: new characters, new environments, new items, new potential for chaos.

Wreckin' Raccoon is intended to be wholesome chaos and fun.

It is developed by nDreams Compass for Meta Quest 2 and 3 headsets.

name: Wrong
summary: A paranoid schizophrenic searches for his girlfriend’s killer in a decaying city.

name: Wrap Shop Simulator
summary: Serve fast, cook smart, and rise as a culinary legend.

name: Wrecking Wave
summary: Wrecking Wave is an explosive action game with physics-based destruction focused on Challenge and Speedrun. Unleash a wave of chaos and smash cities, chase high scores and stop a mad scientist from polluting your ocean with toxic waste.

name: Wrath and Retribution
summary: WRATH AND RETRIBUTION is a fast-paced space combat roguelike where you battle massive warships, collect powerful loot, and unleash devastating abilities. Pilot your groundbreaking ship alongside your onboard companion as you fight the relentless Remnants!

name: Writhing
summary: Explore the depths of Heaven's Gate Space Station and the solar system it orbits in Writhing: A new Sci-Fi Fantasy FPS that explores space in another universe that parallels ours. Hunt down an evil alternative resource baron, Moloch's avatar, and their army of evil spawn in this backwards universe.

name: Wrath of Mynah
summary: Wrath of Mynah is a turn-based RPG adventure game that follows the gripping story of The Great Hanyem War. Hundreds of years after Mynah Smith arrived on Hanyem, you play as Pike Gilder, a petty thief who wants to make a difference in the everlasting fight against the tyrannical Indigallo Federation as they lose their grip over their territories. Join forces with a plethora of unique party members, such as Tusk, Liz Fureon, Deven Proditor, Rosie, Nova Acri, and Val Fortis! Collect items, armor and weapons! Uncover the deep history and lore of Hanyem and the human, felibrawno, and gisharen people. Eventually you will be prepared for the ultimate battle against the mysterious General Zed Aurum and King Mynah Smith IX!

name: Wretched Lead
summary: Build your city block by block and find the optimal layout to defend yourself against an onslaught of enemies. Explore the underground to gather resources and expand your settlement in all directions. Balance economy and defenses to persist in an unforgiving wasteland.

name: WriteNor
summary: WriteNor is a first-person psychological horror game that simulates a coding environment. The player assumes the role of a developer tasked with debugging a corrupted simulation, only to be confronted by a rogue AI entity named Nori. The game features a diegetic interface where all UI elements exist within the game world, including a functional console terminal used to alter the environment and delete objects. WriteNor explores themes of artificial intelligence, fourth-wall breaking mechanics, and the blurring line between software and reality.

name: Wreckborn
summary: Cleanse the system of pirates, destroy their bases and free the captives. On the asteroids, build a base, mining colonies, explore asteroids and extract resources needed for survival. Develop buildings, build defenses and turn the asteroid into a fortress.

name: Wrong Way
summary: "Escape the psychological nightmare by solving ingenious puzzles. Every object you touch hides secrets. Every code you crack brings you closer to freedom… or to final destruction."

name: Wrongly Accused
summary: Explore historical locations, find and analyse evidence. Unmask the real perpetrator so that justice can be served and the Wrongly Accused can be found innocent. Use problem solving, deduction and critical thinking skills to uncover the truth and maybe even expose a conspiracy in your own time.

name: Wrath of the Arcane Realms
summary: Wrath of the Arcane Realms is a hexagon-based, turn-based roguelike strategy game. Assemble a party of 3 from 6 heroes, chart your path across the realms, and craft your own synergies by drafting unique skills. There is no "correct" way to save the Arcane Realms. Don't seek the solution—define it!
